0: Room and facilities were top notch as I have come to expect with embassy suites
Love the style of the rooms atrium etc
Now the room and the lobby was very clean just tired
The staff was exceptionally friendly polite helpful and the facility is very well kept
The 530 to 730 free drinks at the lobby bar were a nice treat each day
I love the suite style of Embassy along with the free breakfast and evening reception
This Embassy Suites Hotel is an older facility but has been kept up well
Morning Breakfast is excellent and it adds value as does the evening managers reception
The accommodations were excellent along with staff
1: However the HUGE crane in the atrium was distracting and we had no notification of that pending work when making the reservations
I was in the room right above the banquet hall
i was denied my points for honors and denied access to facilities
I arrived after dark and did not realize the entrance was on the side of the building
Room was next door to elevator in front pool righ in back
Floors in the elevators were just bad and looked like they were missing a layer
Guests ended up waiting for the elevator for quite a while every time they needed to go to their rooms or back to the lobby
Then later that evening both elevators was down over 24 hours
Elevator broken for the entire stay with little done to minimize wait time
We were even stuck in broken elevator at one point
